net.corda.node.services.persistence

Class DBTransactionMappingStorage

  • net.corda.node.services.persistence.DBTransactionMappingStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateMachineRecordedTransactionMappingStorage

    public class DBTransactionMappingStorage
implements StateMachineRecordedTransactionMappingStorage

    Database storage of a txhash -> state machine id mapping.

    Mappings are added as transactions are persisted by ServiceHub.recordTransaction, and never deleted. Used in the RPC API to correlate transaction creation with flows.

    See Also:
    ServiceHub.recordTransaction

      Database storage of a txhash -> state machine id mapping.
